snippet: At least five children were among the dead; it was the first bombing of a camp for people displaced in the Boko Haram conflict.
abstract: Nigerian emergency officials report bomb explosion at Yolo refugee camp, largest settlement for those uprooted by Boko Haram rebellion, kills at least seven including five children; Boko Haram Islamic extremists suspected.
lead_paragraph: At least five children were among the dead; it was the first bombing of a camp for people displaced in the Boko Haram conflict.

headline.main: Blast Kills 7 at Nigerian Camp for People Fleeing Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Nigeria: 7 Killed at Camp for Displaced
